pageContext.content:
The Mugs are at it again and have emerged from the studio for a follow-up to their smash hit debut album “All Yobs In”.

DC-Jam Records is proud to bring you DFM’s latest creation entitled “Up In The Downs” which features 14 brand new, jaw breaking tracks that will leave you coming back for more.

“Punk Band of the Year!’ -Blank TV

“A Solid Record Played With Energy And Fervor” -Big Wheel Magazine
pageContext.alt: dirty filthy mugs up in the downs
